BBEX3.M.ETB.USD.CA.AC.A01: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Ethiopia / USD 1 = ETB ... (middle)

Source: Calculated on the basis of the buying and selling rates of the following banks:Since December 2011: Commercial Bank of Ethiopia, Addis Ababa.September 1998 - November 2011: National Bank of Ethiopia, Addis Ababa.1996 - August 1998: National Bank of Ethiopia,  Addis Ababa (for middle rates).
Comment on 2010-01: Exchange rate as of 9 February 2010.

Comment on 2010-09: On 1 September 2010, the Ethiopian birr was devalued. Calculated using the exchange rates from 31 August and 1 September (USD 1 = ETB 16.3514 / 16.6784 (buying/selling rate)) the birr was devalued by 16.7%.
